name: Scott Logic
accessibility: The event room and kitchen facilities are all located on the 5th floor, accessible by lift. Toilets on the ground floor have step-free access whilst other toilets are up one flight of stairs; toilet markers for these toilets are gendered. There are no steps into the building, when you arrive, ring the buzzer and someone will let you into the building.
howToFind: The building is next to the Phantom of the Opera. We're on the 5th floor.
